about_the_game:
After the disappearance of his sister Maria, Marcelo decides to start his search on his own, Marcelo goes alone to the Myson mansion, which was the last place she visited.

A horror game in an environment scared with a bizarre mansion and a secret bunker is what awaits Marcelo on his journey, investigate the place, solve puzzles, overcome obstacles and build the story to try to understand what happened in this horrible place and the main thing find Maria and unravel the mystery of her disappearance.

• Explore Myson Mansion – A First-person horror game with scary visuals.
• Gameplay, Puzzles - Based on great classic Horror games.
• Innovative story - Despite being inspired by other games, Panspermia has a unique plot created exclusively for the game's story.
• Survive the horrors – Search for supplies and weapons to stay alive while running, hiding or fighting strange creatures.
• Solve the mystery of Maria's disappearance – Secrets are revealed as Marcelo advances on his journey.
• To understand your present, you'll need to understand your past – The Myson mansion and its secrets have more hidden things than anyone thinks, a mix of Suspense and Horror.

A bizarre mystery awaits you in this Horror game, help Marcelo find his sister and stay alive, IF YOU CAN.

content_descriptors.notes: It may have scenes of death and blood, use of weapons.
